Info: After giving your response, you can ask the same question in the following ways:

Irish: Cá bhfuil tú i do chónaí?
English: Where do you live? (literal: where are you in your living?)

Irish: Tá mé i mo chónaí i(n)...
Tá mé i mo chónaí in Aontroim.
Tá mé i mo chónaí i nDún Geanainn.
Cad é an seoladh atá agat?
Is as Ard Mhacha **ó dhúchas** mé, ach tá mé i mo chónaí i mBeal Feirste anois.
English: I'm originally from Armagh, but I live in Belfast now.
Phonetic: As Ard Whacha **oh huhas** meh, ack taw may i mo hoaney in mel ferste anish

Info: maybe.. in the center of the city???
